creator: Syn0P@netscape.net
text:
The Apache error log says:

The system cannot find the file specified.  : couldn't create child process:
22502: <filename>

 -and-

The system cannot find the file specified.  : couldn't spawn child process:
<filename>
when I try to run a CGI script in the /cgi-bin/ folder.

creator: wrowe@apache.org
text:
This is likely a misconfig.  Please address your question to the appropriate
  user support forum, such as the users list or the 
  comp.infosystems.www.servers.ms-windows newsgroup.
